title: Riot stop this autofil madness please
body:
Not because of you but because of all those unskiled players whose dmg and skils are way too important for the win.... lets say adc....no mater how hardcore one doas play support it can always do more significant change towards win with adc, or any other role ...jsut admit it and give us those 5 minute queue times back pls :D

I am always ready to sacrifice wait time for the quality, which teribly lacks in low mmr ranked in  which im in , and im asured most of the players think the same

I wouldnt write this post in any other case but somehow everytime i get autofil i also get extra stupid teammates in compare to enemy team


I think its time for teemo support again... zero care + even less care = win   haha  :D

Is there any other way to handle with minimum stress  those noobs  in silver im geting matched with, other than Teemo?  if anyone have any idea pls tell me    

P.S. i dont intend to maximize my skills in supp role just because i get autofiled .... supp role is just to feminine... low  action and bunch of stress while playing with players whose skill levels are way lower than mine 

{{champion:30}}  peace .....

replies.body: The classic response is to complain about losing for bad teammates. Afk's, trolls, and getting paired with players not at your skill level is the constant issue of the game. Send your complaints to riot, not us.

riot doasnt have nothing with boards?  motivating people to upvote the topic about issues so that some of riots employees see that and eventualy talk about problems has nothing to do with resolving the issue ? that you want to say

if there is better way to get issues recognized by ones who can have effect on its change ,then please enlight me ....im not  being sarcastic 

P.S. i didnt write to you(guys with attitude like "dont bother me with this") , i wrote to people who also might recognize the issue as a real one :)

Soo you're crying about getting autofilled into support? Stop right there. 

Do it better.
classic response .... do it better.... for your information that is always a goal for most players.... to be better ... just look around you ...its competative game after all

im not even mad, who cry? i just pointed out a problem which not only me but many other players pointed out 

clear enought?
If you're playing with noobs then system thinks you're a noob too, and from that perspective you supporting them or them supporting you would be the same thing.

So you don't want to support because it is... feminine? What supports do you play?

Alistar is like a big beefy bodyguard that wades into the enemy team to keep them from laying down dps.

There are many other examples, but honestly I feel some of the suppirts are more masculine than the other roles, not that I care either way.

Lulu support ftw.

I see you didnt figure out what i want to say in that context

Feminine in this matter was said for all supports , not just female champions but whole support role (as you said - "protection" - its feminine atribute as a role)

Stick to the reasons why autofil is a problem, and why not.....instead of sticking to my side coments  ;)

I disagree with your comment about the femininity of the role, and honestly think it is more masculine than feminine.

However, since you want to talk about autofill; I think it is a much more positive thing for the game than negative. In the old draft pick, you were stuck supporting 1/5 of your games generally. I queue as mid/support and support less than 1/5 of my games. I have been autofilled once as jungle.

The decreased queue times are definitely worth occasionally being filled to another lane.

In adition : i never saw worser supports on ranked than those after autofil came to the  scene ... and whats the irony of it , supps were never easier , just look the gold income items ..not even to mention redemption and items alike 


unfortunately not many people wants to talk about  problems (rationaly), not only on boards.... people are weak in general nowadays :/


its hopeless ... case closed :)

 {{champion:30}}

You lost me at...

> ...supp role is just to feminine...
